description.@en: Ingesting the vile liquid, you spit a stream of hot, acidic blood towards a hated foe.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the foe’s armor loses 3 from its Damage Threshold Modifier from acid damage until it is repaired. Your foe can successfully Resist with a Coordination Test.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foe’s armor and clothing are instantly destroyed.

criticalFailure.@en: Your stomach makes a terrible noise, as if you had too much blood sausage. You instantly soil your smallclothes and now suffer from Bloody Flux.

reagents.@en: A vial of blood from your own Ancestry, ingested (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can see
